text: @realDonaldTrump You trump haters are a joke. I’m English and don’t really care but from what I see, the Democrats ante the most corrupt group of people on this earth! Biden has dementia, Pelosi is a witch and the rest of them are retards! Before Covid-19 this country was booming more than ever!!
